actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that service performed by a citizen of the United States as an employee of the Roosevelt Campobello International Park Commission shall constitute employment for purposes of the Federal Unemployment Tax Act.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that service performed by a citizen of the United States as an employee of the Roosevelt Campobello International Park Commission shall constitute employment for purposes of the Federal Unemployment Tax Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that service performed by a citizen of the United States as an employee of the Roosevelt Campobello International Park Commission shall constitute employment for purposes of the Federal Unemployment Tax Act.
